line.comment: * We don't shoot missiles at missiles.
* Don't engage if Pirate contract is unlocked (player only).
* If our pirate target is the player
* If our target is owned by the sector owner.
* $outpost = find station: sector=[SECTOR] class or type={Player Outpost} race=$sector.owner flags=null refobj=null maxdist=null maxnum=1 refpos=null
* If there's an outpost with the pirate contract, dont fire.
* Herobetty 5.4: Joining the OCV voids a pirate contract.
* Mayhem: limit the fireworks effect. Also see !ship.cmd.missile.attack.std.
* This command returns 0 if there are no lasers currently equipped.

sval.val: We don't shoot missiles at missiles.
Don't engage if Pirate contract is unlocked (player only).
If our pirate target is the player
If our target is owned by the sector owner.
$outpost = find station: sector=[SECTOR] class or type={Player Outpost} race=$sector.owner flags=null refobj=null maxdist=null maxnum=1 refpos=null
If there's an outpost with the pirate contract, dont fire.
Herobetty 5.4: Joining the OCV voids a pirate contract.
Mayhem: limit the fireworks effect. Also see !ship.cmd.missile.attack.std.
This command returns 0 if there are no lasers currently equipped.
